src_original: vaiśāradyaprāptair mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhair dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalair
tgt_original: 38 mārakarmasamatikrāttaḥ |  39 karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhaḥ |  40 dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalaḥ |

src_original: asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhir vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair  gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair  anantakalpakoṭīniḥsaraṇakuśalair māyāmarīcidakacandrasvapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktaiḥ
tgt_original: 41 asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaḥ |  42 smitamukhapūrvābhilāṣī |  43 gāthābhirgītābhilīpanaḥ |  49 apratihatacittaḥ |

src_original: yāthātmyāvatāraṇakuśalaiḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrānantavyūhapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītair
tgt_original: 52 yathātmyavatārakuśalaḥ |  53 buddhakṣetravyūhānattapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītaḥ |

src_original: asaṃkhyeyalokadhātubuddhānusmṛtisamāhitasatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair
tgt_original: 54 asaṃkhyepalokadhātubuddhānusmṛtisamādhisatatasamitābhimukhībhūtaḥ |  55 aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalaḥ |

src_original: nānādṛṣṭyanuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaśatasahasranirhārakuśalaiḥ.
tgt_original: 56 nānādṛṣṭānuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaḥ |

src_original: asty avalokitamūrdhā nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 7 vilokitamūrdho nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ,  asti niyatadhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 8 dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ |  9 niyatadhvajaketurnāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 10 vajro nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti sarvadharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ,  asti samāhitāvasthāpratiṣṭhāno nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 11 sarvadharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ |  12 samādhirājāsupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti rājamudro nāma samādhiḥ,  asti balavīryo nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 13 raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ |  14 balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti sarvadharmasamudgato nāma samādhiḥ,  asti dhāraṇīmudro nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 15 samudgato nāma samādhiḥ |  16 niruktiniyatapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ |  17 adhivacanapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asty ākāśasphāraṇo nāma samādhiḥ,  asti vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ,  asti dhvajāgraketurājo nāma samādhiḥ,  astīndraketur nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 21 sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudro nāma samādhiḥ |  22 ākāśaspharaṇo nāma samādhiḥ |  24 dhvajāgrakepūro nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti srotānugato nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 26 śroto'nugato nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti siṃhavijṛmbhito nāmasamādhiḥ,  asti vyatyastasamāpattir nāma samādhiḥ,  asti raṇaṃjaho nāma samādhiḥ,  asti vairocano nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 27 siṃhavijṛmbhito nāma samādhiḥ |  28 vyatyasto nāma samādhiḥ |  29 raṇaṃjaho nāma samādhiḥ |  30 vairocano nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asty animiṣo nāma samādhiḥ,  asty aniketasthito nāma samādhiḥ,  asty aniścito nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 32 aniketasthito nāma samādhiḥ |  33 niścitto nāma samādhiḥ |  34 vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ |  35 anattaprabho nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: astivipulapratipanno nāma samādhiḥ,  asty anantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ,  asti prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ,  asti varadharmamudro nāma samādhiḥ,  asti samantāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 36 prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ |  37 śuddhasāro nāma samādhiḥ |  38 vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ |  40 vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ |  41 akṣayo nāma samādhiḥ |  42 ajñeyo nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti śuddhāvāso nāma samādhiḥ,  asti vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 43 tejovatī nāma samādhiḥ |  44 kṣayāpagato nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: asti ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 45 candravimalo nāma samādhiḥ |  46 sūryapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir ānimittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ
tgt_original: 32 dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ |  33 praṇidhānākalpitaḥ |  34 kṣāttisamatāpratilabdhaḥ |

src_original: dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ,  niyatadhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 8 dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ |  9 niyatadhvajaketurnāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 10 vajro nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: dharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ,  samādhirājasupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 11 sarvadharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ |  12 samādhirājāsupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ,  samudgato nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 13 raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ |  14 balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: sarvadharmapravṛttisamucchedo nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 15 samudgato nāma samādhiḥ |  16 niruktiniyatapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ |  17 adhivacanapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ |  21 sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudro nāma samādhiḥ |  22 ākāśaspharaṇo nāma samādhiḥ |  24 dhvajāgrakepūro nāma samādhiḥ |  26 śroto'nugato nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: raṇajaho nāma samādhiḥ,  vairocano nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 27 siṃhavijṛmbhito nāma samādhiḥ |  28 vyatyasto nāma samādhiḥ |  29 raṇaṃjaho nāma samādhiḥ |  30 vairocano nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: animiṣo nāma samādhiḥ,  aniketasthito nāma samādhiḥ,  niścitto nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 32 aniketasthito nāma samādhiḥ |  33 niścitto nāma samādhiḥ |  34 vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ |  35 anattaprabho nāma samādhiḥ |

src_original: kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair
tgt_original: 35 acyutābhijñaḥ |

src_original: akūhakair alapakair apagatajñātralābhacittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāraṅgatair
tgt_original: 36 nirāmiṣadharmadeśakah |  37 gambhīradharmakṣāttipāramigataḥ |
